title: Game unplayable due to window focus issue

embed.description: Vidme is the simplest way to upload and share videos, no signup required.

body:
Last night I was unable to play a game due to window focus bug.

Basically, when the game client is not in focus (alt+tab out of game), it responds. Otherwise, it is just reconnecting. Somehow the window focus is inverted.

Step to reproduce (must only be me):
1. Start a custom or a normal game.
2. Wait for the game to load and start.
3. Unplayable.

I have tried the following:
1. Reconnecting multiple times including closing the game and launcher.
2. Restarting.
3. Switching monitors and disconnecting a monitor.
4. Switching window mode and resolution.

PC specs:
Beta launcher client
Windows 10

The issue only began last night and happens every time a game starts. I have linked a video showing the issue.

Any suggestions are welcome!

replies.body:
Most window focus issues that I've seen in the past have been caused by a background application interfering with League. I recommend you [**perform a clean boot**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting#wq3) to ensure no background apps are at play here.

Let me know if you noticed any observable change.
